com.yuep.core.client.util
类 DialogUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.yuep.core.client.util.DialogUtils

public class DialogUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Title: DialogUtils

Description:客户端对话框工具类，比如打开提示窗、确认窗、异常展示窗等

作者：
aaron lee created 2009-2-21 下午01:52:19 modified [who date description] check [who date description]
